8449103592593211322.Text: You have brought me the soulgems. The power in these souls will strengthen your stronghold's foundations and help the tower grow.

15641302621155128511.Text: I gave you two soulgems. Fill them with the souls of Storm Atronachs, Golden Saints, or Winged Twilights. Perhaps someone around here knows where you can find such strong souls.

19389260531509322592.Text: Here, take these grand soulgems. Fill them with the souls of a suitable Daedra. The best souls to use are Storm Atronachs, but more powerful Daedra such as Winged Twilights and Golden Saints will work as well.

18008298771511527415.Text: The souls of a summoned creature will work just as well. Just summon a storm atronach, cast soul trap on it, and dispatch it. Do this twice while carrying a powerful soul gem and give the gems to Llunela Hleran.

2020323255203312480.Text: The souls of a summoned creature will work just as well. Just summon a storm atronach, cast soul trap on it, and dispatch it. Do this twice while carrying a powerful soul gem and give the gems to Llunela Hleran.

64530785235572323.Text: If you cannot find anything suitable, why not just summon a Storm Atronach or two? Surely you can do that, %PCName.
